DOC.brief_summary: A randomized double-blind placebo control intervention study pregnant obese woman ( n=440 ) conduct . The intervention involve consumption fish oil and/or probiotic capsule early pregnancy 6 month delivery . The aim study firstly investigate effect supplement risk gestational diabetes mellitus obesity woman secondly modify risk marker allergy obesity child woman . Also underlie metabolic mechanism investigate .
DOC.criteria: pregnant , less 16 gestational week overweight healthy Diabetes ( type 1 2 ) Coeliac disease Increased bleeding tendency
